title: Larbol Construction
description: Larbol Construction is a Nigerian construction firm specializing in infrastructure development, including road construction, bridge development, building construction, drainage systems, infrastructure planning, and project management. With a commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction, Larbol Construction delivers projects that meet modern infrastructure needs while ensuring safety, timely delivery, cost efficiency, and eco-friendly practices.
notes: Built using modern web technologies and deployed on Vercel for optimal performance and scalability.

title: Blog CMS Platform
description: A modern, full-stack content management system designed for personal blogging. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and Redux Toolkit, this platform offers a seamless user experience for creating, editing, and managing digital content. It features user authentication, content CRUD operations, and a responsive interface, all deployed on Vercel for optimal performance and scalability.
notes: Developed by Code With Mercy as a personal project to enhance skills in full-stack development and modern web technologies.

title: BeautySpace
description: BeautySpace is a Nigerian digital platform that connects users with a wide range of beauty and wellness services, including salons, spas, massage therapists, and barbershops. Through its user-friendly website and mobile apps, BeautySpace allows customers to discover top-rated professionals nearby and book appointments either at home or in the salon, offering convenience and flexibility. The platform also provides business management tools for beauty professionals, streamlining scheduling, customer engagement, and service delivery. Founded in 2022 and headquartered in Lagos, BeautySpace is committed to enhancing the beauty service experience across Nigeria.
notes: Migrated from React to Next.js to improve performance and SEO.

title: ShowTrackr
description: ShowTrackr is a modern web application that helps users track movies and TV shows, stay updated on upcoming releases, and manage their personalized watchlists. Designed with a clean and intuitive interface, the platform features sections for Discover, Trending, Upcoming, and TV Shows, making it easy for users to explore new content. It also includes reminders for upcoming episodes, personalized recommendations, and newsletter updates. Built with a strong focus on performance and user experience, ShowTrackr showcases how technology can enhance entertainment discovery and organization.
notes: Built as a personal project to explore watchlist management, API integration, and performance optimization with Next.js.

title: Sparks and Stories
description: Sparks and Stories is a creative writing platform that offers insightful articles, engaging stories, and thought-provoking content across various categories, including technology, entertainment, and anime. The platform aims to inspire creativity and foster a community of writers and readers.
notes: Developed by Code With Mercy, this platform emphasizes clean design and user-friendly navigation to enhance the reading experience.
